official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to include Charleston Harbor, South Carolina, in the National estuary program.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to give priority consideration to the inclusion of Charleston Harbor, South Carolina, in the National Estuary program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to include Charleston Harbor, South Carolina, in the National estuary program.
